statements: DELETE FROM appointments WHERE patient_name = 'Alice' AND appointment_date = '2022-10-01';
DELETE FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date < '2023-01-01' AND doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND appointment_date = '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M' AND address LIKE '%California%';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id IN (2, 3);
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 2 AND patient_age > 30;
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 101 AND diagnosis = 'Influenza';
